item.telepotions.recall_potion.lore: Returns you to your home location
item.telepotions.wormhole_potion.lore: Teleports you to another player. Rename it to target's name.
item.telepotions.wormhole_potion.error: The target player could not be found on this world
item.telepotions.teleportation_potion.lo: Teleports you to the world spawn
